vraag.vraagstelling: He aha ke kumu o ka hoʻohana ʻana i kēia mea?
vraag.antwoord: Hiki ke hōʻike a hūnā i nā pane o nā nīnau maʻa mau aiʻole haʻawina aʻo. Ma ke kīkē ʻana ma ka nīnau e hōʻike aiʻole hūnā ana i ka pane.

vraag.vraagstelling: Akā he waihoʻoluʻu a kinona hua ponoʻī kaʻu ma koʻu kahua pūnāwelewele uila?
vraag.antwoord: Hiki nō ke hoʻololi waihoʻoluʻu a kinona hua ma ka mahele koho o kēia mea.

vraag.vraagstelling: How do I get my QA in the gadget?
vraag.antwoord: Good Question. You can type a url to an xml-file in one of the options of the gadget. This xml-file has to have a specific structure.
